casebody.data:
ROYAL INDEMNITY COMPANY, Appellant, v. R. S. SPROUL, Trustee of the Estate of Morris Samuel PERELSTINE, Trading as Carter Shoe Company, Bankrupt, Appellee. No. 4476. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Feb. 6, 1931. See, also, 15 F.(2d) 64; 19 F.(2d) 408. Frank K. Willmann, of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant. Sidney J. Watts and Lewis M. Alpem, both of Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.

Before BUFFINGTON and WOOLLEY, Circuit Judges, and THOMPSON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the District Court [44 F. (2d) 62] is affirmed on Judge Schoonmaker’s opinion.
